_header: Jerusalem in English is / As mickle to say as sight of peace
Note: Portions of the text show verbal similarities to the Pricke of Conscience. For the text in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 570.
_description: Gospel for Tenth Sunday after Trinity, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
JErusalem on Englisch isAs muche to seyn as siht of
                    pes…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…God ȝif vs grace þat we mayCome þer is euere
                    gomen and play. Amen
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Ierusalem on ynglihsse esAls mikil to saie als fight of
                    pes…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…God giue vs grace þat we maieCome to heuene þare
                    euer es plaie . Amen .

Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
Als seynt Luk þis day telles vsToward Jerusalem come
                    ihesus…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Al myghti god þedire vs bryngAnd graunte vs alle gode
                    endyng
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Dominica xa post festum trinitatis secundum Lucam (p.
                    248)

CULDd11.First Lines:
IErusalem forsoþe on Englische isals mekil to seyne as þe
                    sighte of pes…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…& to þat ioye bringevs heÞat for vs deyde on
                    þe rode tre
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Dominica 10a euangelium secundum Lucam. Cum appropinquasset
                        ihesus ierusalem videns ciuitatem & ce. (f.
                    156v)

CULGg531.First Lines:
Jerusalem on Inglisch esAls mykyll at say as syght of
                    pes…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…God gyf vs grace þat we mayCome þider þar uer
                    es gammen and play Amen
CULGg531.Attributed Title:
Þis es þe gospell of þe tende sonday (f. 104v,
                    with two lines Latin scripture)

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynt luke says Ierusalem one ynglys eseals mykyll at say als cyte
                    of pese…
